00228 template <class Archive> 
00229 bool CMainWindowGuiComp::SerializeRecentFiles()
00230 {
00231        istd::CString applicationName = "ACF Application";
00232        istd::CString companyName = "ImagingTools";
00233 
00234        if (m_applicationInfoCompPtr.IsValid()){ 
00235               applicationName = m_applicationInfoCompPtr->GetApplicationAttribute(ibase::IApplicationInfo::AA_APPLICATION_NAME);
00236               companyName = m_applicationInfoCompPtr->GetApplicationAttribute(ibase::IApplicationInfo::AA_COMPANY_NAME);
00237        }
00238 
00239        Archive archive(iqt::GetQString(companyName), iqt::GetQString(applicationName));
00240 
00241        return SerializeRecentFileList(archive);
00242 }
